article.title: Lockheed Awarded Nearly $2 Billion for Satellite Production Launch Operations
article.author: George I. Seffers
article.text: Lockheed Martin Space Systems Co., Sunnyvale, Calif., is being awarded a $1,936,500,000 contract modification for advanced extremely high vehicle space vehicle 5 and 6 production launch operations. The contracting activity is the Space and Missile Systems Center, Los Angeles Air Force Base, Calif.
